name: Come And Shoot
description:
Online game with some mini-games in format "Destroy others and don`t destroy yourself". it also includes chat, 3 online rooms, very small ping to 50 ms, and fun!

Game is in early access, so you can support it buy your money if you thinks that it`s good!

0.2: Better sounds, new mini-game "Bags", "More..." button, better menu, update of game room.
